org_name: Mary McLeod Bethune Day Academy PCS
description: The mission of the Mary McLeod Bethune Day Academy Public Charter School is to implement a high performing day school that provides a challenging academic program in a supportive, parentally involved, and diverse learning environment to enable each student to achieve academic success, talent, and positive social development.

contact.name: Mr. Jubria A. Lewis, ES Principal & Mr. C. Maurice Porter, MS Principal
